text:
Hi <@U0466HLJ3AM>,

HubSpot doesn't natively support multi step forms, you'll have to build your form and then add some custom javascript on the page to remodel the form to a multi-step one.

Otherwise, I'm sure there should be some themes on the marketplace that offer such functionnality.
<@U02JH23B6T1> do you know anything about how can we create custom forms in HubSpot ?

You will have to code a custom module for the CMS.
Your module will have to embark a form field so your users can select the corresponding HubSpot form.

Then as I said, you will have to rely on custom javascript added to your module to get all the fields and then remodel the html into a multi step form.
Have a look at the HubSpot CMS developper resources.
The best place to start is probably there as if you're a a HubSpot newbie, you'll have much to learn before you're able to make that happen.
